pageContext.claim: “These are 25, 30, 35,000. We had a 41,000 -- and the only thing that stopped us, look at the size. The only thing that stops us is the, uh, configuration, or we could have tripled this number. In Ohio, we could've had four times, uh, this pl -- it was just like this, but we could've had four times the number. The people on the streets I couldn't get.”
pageContext.analysis: Again, more fantasy numbers for crowd estimates. Trump has previously said his rally at Ocala International Airport on Oct. 16 attracted 41,000. Media estimates ranged from 4,000 to 5,000.
